name: Jumpy Shooty Game
description:
VERSION CHANGES 1.1.1

* Fixed game-ending bug when attempting to shoot while also dying

VERSION CHANGES 1.1

* Verbally abusive KARENS are now blue with pent up rage

* Difficulty has been adjusted in later levels

* Keyboard controls clarified (cryptically)

* Minor bug fixes

Welcome to Jumpy Shooty Game! This is my first ever game project and I'm very excited about it. That said, I know it's far from perfect - so please let me know your thoughts (especially any bugs you find, so I can practise squashing them).

THE STORY

Something has caused the Karens of the world to grow violent and overdramatic. Pacify them with the power of TRUTH (yes I know it looks like a fireball, but they're fine). Track down the source of the problem and solve it once and for all.

movement - wasd or arrow keys

shoot - shift

jump - space

read - e

quit - esc

Gamepad support tbc ;)
